112.content: Its been 8 years since Ash started his journey. He was meeting up with Misty in person for the first time in three of them in Viridian city. On the way he was having a battle against A really tuff trainer and finally beat him with a well timed thunder bolt against his garados. "Congratulations! You beat the strongest trainer you've ever fought before! As a reward take this!" He handed Ash a stone and was gone like clockwork. "Huh, that was weird." Ash said to himself, then he looked down at the stone. it looked like an evolutionary stone, but where a leaf or sun or something would normally be there was a black spiral. Before this could process in Ash's mind the stone glowed in a light, not unlike that of a pokemon evolving, and vanished. "And that was weirder." Ash thought before he noticed the time. He ran as fast as he could getting to Viridian city half an hour late. Naturally Misty was mad. "What took you so long!? Eight years and you still hardly grew up, jeez." Misty pouted. "Come on I said I was sorry." Ash said just wanting to hurry up and get to doing whatever Misty had planned for today. 'Man, I wish she would just calm down already.' Ash thought. Misty seemed to space out for a moment and then said "Well I guess your hear now. Come on! We,re going to a bike trail, today. I thought it would help repay your ever standing debt." "Ok, ok. lets go!" Ash said just happy that Misty did what he wanted for once.

1553.content:
Ash was re-visiting the Sinnoh region for personal reasons. in his travels he discovered an orange stone and quickly realized it's awesome power of controlling other people. He was looking for someone in particular to take control of.

Cynthia was enjoying her walk far away from all the press and endless battle challenges. It was peaceful in the forest and she loved to be out in nature. Unfortunately she didn't realize that she wasn't alone in the woods. An orange glow enveloped the champion and she was startled to say the least. She quickly relaxed from that feeling though and she just kept relaxing. Her mind quieted and her body became loose as she stood there.

Within minutes the glow subsided and Ash left his hiding spot. He wasn't expecting to find Cynthia here, he was looking for her vacation home. Ash was never one to look a gift ponyta in the mouth however and was happy that things played out the way they did.

"Cynthia." Ash said waiting to hear the result he wanted.

Cynthia softly spoke back "Yes master?"

Ash was over joyed! It worked better then he had hoped, she already knew what the score was. He got closer to examine his prize. Cynthia was quiet a catch. 'Pretty face, long flowing hair, a nice figure and great tits.' Ash thought as he grabbed one. Cynthia stood there blankly as the boy groped her breast. Ash grabbed her other boob and continued playing with them as Cynthia stood there without a thought in her mind.

"Is your vacation home here?" Ash asked

"Yes master. It's hidden nearby and only I can get in. No one else is there right now." Cynthia answered back.

"Good. Take me there."

"Yes master."

Cynthia turned and walked toward her hidden vacation home. Ash reluctantly had to stop playing with her boobs so she could lead the way there but he kept a hand on her ass the whole way there. About half an hour of walking later they reached the house it was well disguised but still big and luxurious on the inside.

"This is perfect!" Ash exclaimed "Now Cynthia, I want you to strip to your underwear. It'll liven up the decor of the place."

"Yes Master." Cynthia said as she began to take off her clothes.

"Hmm...I think you should do it sexier. You know like a strip tease."

"Yes Master."

Cynthia began moving her body with more energy. Ash watched in delight as the Sinnoh champion, one of the most respected trainers in the world, danced like a stripper for him. It was a dream come true.

When she was done Ash was slightly disappointed. "Plain white underwear?" Ash examined "I'll have to fix that."

Cynthia stood in front of Ash mostly naked. Her underwear was only a functional, and comfortable, white pair of panties and a bra but her form filled it out spectacularly. Ash was happy with the results and was eager to start phase two of his plan.

155331.content:
Ash was certain in his ability to capture things. Spending a life time collecting pokemon he understood when to so a head on fight to catch his prey, and when a softer touch was required. He was far more careful in his methods of catching Sabrina then he was in his methods of catching Cynthia. While she was a strong trainer, Cynthia didn't have any power of her own. Ash saw first hand what Sabrina's power could do and it was because of that power that he decided that she would be his next target. It also made him cautious but he was always a strategic thinker. He already knew how the was going to get Sabrina under his control.

Sabrina was excited to see Ash again. Haunter was asleep at the moment (funny how you never think that a spirit would need rest) but he would be over joyed when he woke up. Sabrina was waiting for Ash in the forest he was hiding out in expecting to see some psychic pokemon that he caught and wanted her to see it. What she was didn't expect was having trouble finding Ash when tracking his thoughts.

"Hey Sabrina, over here!" Ash called out, prepared for the worst. He was wearing tin foil under his hat. It was a FOIL proof plan. Ash died a little inside from making that pun.

"Hello Ash." Sabrina said walking up to her soon to be master. "Sorry I was having trouble finding you. Are you wearing tin foil on your head?"

"What? Don't be ridiculous, you're my friend. Why would I be scared of your advanced psychic abilities that turned human beings into stuffed dolls in front of my eyes?"

"Well, I have to say I'm a little hurt." Sabrina said making an over exaggerated frowning face "How could you be scared of little ol' me after all the help you've given me?"

"I thought you would have been more upset about your powers not working through a thin sheet of metal."

"Don't remind me." Sabrina said with an annoyed look in her eyes "My one weakness is a cleche."

"Hey hey hey, don't worry" Ash said "You're also weak to the power of laughter."

Sabrina chuckled "So anyway," she said "Where's this new pokemon you wanted to show me?"

"It's right here." Ash said reaching into his pocket. He grabbed onto the stone and hoped that it worked. Of coarse if it didn't then he would just pull out his new Bronzor. There was no reason to not have a back up plan.

Sabrina was confused, she felt light headed. She tried to use her advanced psychic abilities to over come this feeling but it felt like it was running on a different level. Somewhere deep inside that her mind was built upon cut couldn't change. Soon her light headed feeling lead to numbness in her mind. Her eyes glassed over and she stood still, not a thought in her head.

"Sabrina?" Ash asked curious of the effect the stone could have on a psychic.

"Yes master?" Sabrina answered.

Ash smiled noting that it had the same effect it had on regular people.

"Follow me"

Ash lead Sabrina back to Cynthia's hideaway home. They arrived to the image of Cynthia wearing only an apron.

"Dinner will be ready for us and our new recruit master." Cynthia said "There is still ample time for you to experiment with your catch or coarse."

"Thank you Cynthia, that'll be all for now."

Cynthia bowed and returned to the kitchen preparing the meals that they were going to enjoy.

Ash brought Sabrina to the living room and sat in his chair.

"Sabrina, give me a strip tease. Feel free to make it as erotic as you wish."

"Yes master." Sabrina replied and began to dance. She had a different method than Cynthia did, she danced as erotic as she possible could and psychically removed her clothes at the same. It became a lap dance with Sabrina's clothing literally flying off of her body.

Once she was down to her underwear Ash ordered "Stop. Stand up and let me get a look at you."

"Yes master" Sabrina answered and stood at attention ready to be examined.

"Finally someone with decent taste in underwear." Ash said looking over Sabrina's body in hot red lingerie. "Tell me why you decided to wear that hot little number Sabrina."

"I ran out of other underwear to wear master. I was going to do laundry once I returned home."

"Oh." Ash said a little disappointed that she didn't do it for her. "Well no matter now. Soon you'll only be wearing things of that caliber."

"Yes master" Sabrina said back still in monotone

"Master" Cynthia said walking in the room "Your dinner is ready."

"All right then." Ash said "I suppose we can take a break to eat. Come along Sabrina, it's feeding time."

"Yes master" Sabrina said

When they went into the dinning room there was three plates. One had a full meal expertly crafted, while the others had what looked like pokemon food on them.

"As you can see I am a benevolent master." Ash said "Giving you the healthiest of diet foods, all mushed up and mixed together. Of coarse, you are going to eat them without utensils or your hands. Just shove your faces in there and go at it like everything else that's as smart as you are."

"Yes, master." The girls replied together.

While ash ate a full meal at the head of the table Sabrina and Cynthia shoved their face into cold mushed up vegetables, chosen to keep their bodies fit and hot. Although As always added his own special ingredient. He makes it himself and adds it in to give it more of a salty flavor for his pets.

Once they were done eating Ash led them to the bed room. "I hope you girls are ready for a long night." Ash said with a wicked grin.

"Yes master." The women replied having no control over their actions.

"Now that I have Sabrina and her powers under my control" Ash thought aloud "My harem will grow much more efficiently. At the very least it will grow in more fun ways."
